name: NATIONAL COUNCIL OF FARMER COOPERATIVES
description: A nationwide association of cooperative businesses owned and controlled by farmers
sampleDescriptions: Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), S. 1, an original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, H.R. 1625, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018, and H.R. 1892, Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018.
Legislative and regulatory services related to tax reform, PL 115-97, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, and PL 115-141, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018.

2018.
